formElement.label: ESX plugin configuration:
formElement.documentation: ESX plugin configuration name. ESX plugin is used create underlying VM hosts for OpenShift cluster setup by importing OVF templates.

formElement.label: ESX Datastore:
formElement.documentation: Name of the datastore to be used.

formElement.label: ESX Host:
formElement.documentation: Name of the host where virtual machines will be imported.

formElement.label: Path to OVF package:
formElement.documentation: Absoulte path to the directory where OVF packages are stored.

formElement.label: OpenShift Project:
formElement.documentation: The name of the OpenShift project to which the services and deployments should be deployed. If the project does not exist, it will be created during service deployment.

formElement.label: OpenShift Service Account:
formElement.documentation: The name of service account to create after OpenShift cluster is setup.

formElement.label: OpenShift VM name prefix:
formElement.documentation: Prefix to be prepended to VM names and their hostnames to uniquely distiguish from other OpenShift setups.

formElement.label: OpenShift Plugin configuration Name:
formElement.documentation: Name OpenShift plugin configaration to create after OpenShift cluster is setup.

formElement.label: OpenShift Master Node Memory (in MBs):
formElement.documentation: Memory in MB for master VM(s).

formElement.label: OpenShift Master Node CPUs:
formElement.documentation: Number of CPUs for master VM(s).

formElement.label: OpenShift Worker Node Memory (in MBs):
formElement.documentation: Memory in MB for node VMs.

formElement.label: OpenShift Worker Node CPUs:
formElement.documentation: Number of CPUs for node VMs.

formElement.label: Topology:
formElement.documentation: Indicates which OpenShift topology to deploy

option.name: Minimal (1 Master, 1 Etcd, both on same machine)
Multiple Etcd (1 Master, 3 Etcd, Master and Etcd on separate machines)
Multiple Etcd + HAProxy (3 Masters, 3 Etcd, 1 HAProxy)

formElement.label: Number of worker nodes:
formElement.documentation: Number of nodes to add to OpenShift cluster.

formElement.label: Domain Name:
formElement.documentation: Domain name to use for imported OpenShift VMs.(e.g. xyz.yourcompany.com)

formElement.label: User login to use:
formElement.documentation: The user ansible will use to login to VMs.This user should have passwordless SSH access preconfigured to imported VMs.
